attributes.action: enact law to revoke the one-day-a-month rule for a Lords main housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The House of Lords recently introduced a rule that permits them to claim allowances on a main residence they only have to sleep in one day per month.
This is ridiculous and uncheckable and should be revoked by law.
Any Lord who supports the ruling should be forced to pay a GBP100K penalty per annum of his/her support.
They still DONT GET IT - DO THEY?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
